solution_line_template: If the shadows lengthen by {feet_per_hour} feet per hour, this means that in {hours_past_noon} hours the shadows would have lengthened from zero to {feet_per_hour}*{hours_past_noon}=<<{feet_per_hour}*{hours_past_noon}={shadow_length_feet}>>{shadow_length_feet} feet.

Since there are {inches_per_foot} inches in every foot, this means the building's shadow would be {shadow_length_feet}*{inches_per_foot}= <<{shadow_length_feet}*{inches_per_foot}={shadow_length_inches}>>{shadow_length_inches} inches in length.
